abstract: The nation’s largest retailer and a bellwether for the economy said sales and profit surged in the first quarter, but it warned it might miss earnings expectations for the current quarter.
snippet: The nation’s largest retailer and a bellwether for the economy said sales and profit surged in the first quarter, but it warned it might miss earnings expectations for the current quarter.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores, the nation’s largest retailer and a bellwether for the economy, said Tuesday that its sales and profit surged in the first quarter, as belt-tightening consumers flocked to its bargain prices.

headline.print_headline: Sales and Profit Rise, but Wal-Mart Offers a Caution

abstract: Wal-Mart Stores and the TJX Companies said that sales and profit surged during the first three months of the year as consumers flocked to their discounted merchandise.
snippet: Wal-Mart Stores and the TJX Companies said that sales and profit surged during the first three months of the year as consumers flocked to their discounted merchandise.
lead_paragraph: It’s bargain time in American retailing.
